duties_responsibilities.duty: Administer and support Web Center 11.1.x and 12.x systems for invoice processing automation and Quality content/documents management.
Utilize IT Service Management (ITSM) processes and tools for managing service requests, incidents, problems, and changes.

Demonstrate experience in administering Web Center 11.1.x and 12.x systems, including SOA, Capture, Imaging, Web Forms Recognition, Worklist, and BAM reporting as an invoice processing automation solution.
Successfully work within a geographically distributed team and customer environment.
Knowledge of ITSM and Systems Development Lifecycle (SDLC) concepts.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in IT or a related field (Master's preferred)
